elements.name: question2
elements.title: Question2
elements.minRateDescription: I have no phlegm (mucus) in my chest at all
elements.maxRateDescription: My chest is completely full of phlegm (mucus)

elements.name: question3
elements.title: Question3
elements.minRateDescription: My chest does not feel tight at all

elements.name: question4
elements.title: Question4
elements.minRateDescription: When I walk up a hill or one flight of stairs I am not breathless
elements.maxRateDescription: When I walk up a hill or one flight of stairs I am very breathless

elements.name: question5
elements.title: Question5
elements.minRateDescription: I am not limited doing any activities at home
elements.maxRateDescription: I am very limited doing activities at home

elements.name: question6
elements.title: Question6
elements.minRateDescription: I am confident leaving my home despite my lung condition
elements.maxRateDescription: I am not at all confident leaving my home because of my lung condition

elements.name: question7
elements.title: Question7
elements.maxRateDescription: I don't sleep soundly because of my lung condition

elements.name: question8
elements.title: Question8
elements.maxRateDescription: I have no energy at all
